717970f-a.text:
Cabrini Boulevard, (formerly Northern Avenue) west side, north from a point to the south of Chittenden Place (W. 185th Street) and showing a row of apartments that begin at the N.W. corner of that point. At the left is a corner of Dr. Chas. V. Paterno's manorial estate and upon which an apartment project is taking shape, necessitating derolition of the aforermentioned individuals castle-like home. Chittenden Place normally runs parallel to the boulevard but here it has absorbed that short street that joins both
thoroughfares.
August 25, 1938.
P.L. Sperr
